00014 #ifndef ULIB_DES3_H
00015 #define ULIB_DES3_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/base/ssl/des3.h>
00018 
00019 #include <ulib/string.h>
00020 
00021 struct U_EXPORT UDES3 {
00022 
00023         static void setPassword(const char* passwd)
00024                 {
00025                 U_TRACE(0, "UDES3::setPassword(%S)", passwd)
00026 
00027                 u_des3_key(passwd);
00028                 }
00029 
00030         static void encode(const unsigned char* s, uint32_t n, UString& buffer)
00031                 {
00032                 U_TRACE(0, "UDES3::encode(%.*S,%u,%.*S)", n, s, n, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer))
00033 
00034                 long pos = u_des3_encode(s, n, (unsigned char*)buffer.data());
00035 
00036                 buffer.size_adjust(pos);
00037                 }
00038 
00039         static void encode(const UString& s, UString& buffer)
00040                 { encode((const unsigned char*)U_STRING_TO_PARAM(s), buffer); }
00041 
00042         static bool decode(const unsigned char* s, uint32_t n, UString& buffer)
00043                 {
00044                 U_TRACE(0, "UDES3::decode(%.*S,%u,%.*S)", n, s, n, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer))
00045 
00046                 long pos = u_des3_decode(s, n, (unsigned char*)buffer.data());
00047 
00048                 buffer.size_adjust(pos);
00049 
00050                 bool result = (pos > 0);
00051 
00052                 U_RETURN(result);
00053                 }
00054 
00055         static bool decode(const UString& s, UString& buffer)
00056                 { return decode((const unsigned char*)U_STRING_TO_PARAM(s), buffer); }
00057 };
00058 
00059 #endif
